Title: Fundamental group is abelian iff the fundamental group isomorphisms (a-hat) coincide
AcceptedAnswer: Hint: note that $f \ast \alpha  := \gamma$ is a path from $x$ to $y$, and calculate $\bar{\gamma}$ by its definition. Then you are given: $\hat{\gamma} ([g])= \hat{\alpha} ([g])$, which should cancel to what you want.

Problem:
